title: Participants in tackle football in the U.S. from 2006 to 2018
summary: In general Number of participants in millions has fallen over the Year.
Number of participants in millions is slightly decreasing from 2010 to 2012, roughly constant from 2012 to 2014, and lastly slightly increasing from 2014 to 2015.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2010 and 2011.
Maximum Number of participants in millions, about 6.91 was reported at Year 2010
Minimum Number of participants in millions about 5.98 was reached at Year 2014
